articleContent:
Dear Rovers:


Wuthering Waves Closed Beta II has concluded and the server is closed.


The dev team has received much feedback from player communities, social media, and in-game surveys. We'll combine these insightful suggestions into follow-up efforts to improve your gaming experience.


Again, we express our sincere gratitude for your continued support! For more information, please stay tuned to our official website and social media.


Wuthering Waves Dev Team
articleTitle: End of Closed Beta II Notice
